Name: Requiring all city agencies to record and report information regarding workplace injuries and illnesses.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring all city agencies to record and report information regarding workplace injuries and illnesses.
BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\sl480\slmult1\ul Be it enacted by the Council as follows\ulnone :\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\sl480\slmult1 Section 1.  \cf0 Section \cf1 12-127 \cf0 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding new subdivisions c and d, to read as follows\cf1 :\cf0\par
\cf1\ul c.  Each agency shall keep records\cf0  of workplace injuries or illnesses occasioned in the line of duty.\cf1   Such records shall include, but not be limited to, the following data: \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li1080\sl480\slmult1\tx1080 (1)\tab\cf0 the name of the person injured and/or filing a claim about such injury;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li1080\sl480\slmult1\cf1 (2)\tab\cf0 such person's title;\cf1\par
(3)\tab\cf0 the date of such injury or illness;\cf1\par
(4)\tab\cf0 the location of such injury or illness; \cf1\par
(5)\tab\cf0 the name of the agency where such person worked and/or such injury occurred; \cf1\par
(6)\tab\cf0 the date such claim was filed, if any;\cf1\par
(7)\tab\cf0 the date such claim was established, if any;\cf1\par
(8)\tab\cf0 the length of time, if applicable, such person is out of work due to such injury or illness;\cf1\par
(9)\tab\cf0 the nature of such injury or illness; and\cf1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li1080\sl480\slmult1\tx1080\tx1170 (10)\tab\cf0 a description of how such injury or illness occurred.\cf1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\sl480\slmult1\tx1170 Each agency shall transmit such data to the law department.  In the case of agencies \cf0 whose employees are covered by workers' compensation or line of duty injury claims, such agencies shall also \cf1 transmit such data to the\cf0  office of management and budget.  \par
\ulnone\tab\ul d.  The law department and the office of management and budget shall each compile and prepare a report from the data provided pursuant to subdivision c of this section.  Such report shall also include, but not be limited to, (i) an analysis of each agency\rquote s workers' compensation expenses, including expenses related to wage replacement, medical costs, administrative costs and any penalties paid by such agency and (ii) an assessment of each agency\rquote s use of modified duty assignments and disability transfers.  The reports shall provide year-to-year comparisons.  Such report shall be transmitted to the department of records and information services pursuant to section 1133 of the charter.  Such report shall also be transmitted each quarter to the mayor, the comptroller, the public advocate and each member of the council.\cf1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\sl480\slmult1\cf0\ulnone\'a72.  This local law shall take effect immediately.\cf1\par
